Title: Directs the public service commission to conduct a study of the reforming the energy vision
Summary: Directs the public service commission to conduct a study of the reforming the energy vision initiative.
LawCode: Add ยง66-p, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to directing the public service commission to conduct a study of the Reforming the Energy Vision initiative
